761:187: kutaḥ punarupapattiprātilambhikaṃ bhaviṣyatītyetacca sandhāya bhagavatoktam-“cyutau batemau mohapuruṣāvasmāddharmavi[na]yādyatra nāmānayoḥ mohapuruṣayorūṣmagatamapi nāsti” iti|

761:292: tau tu gatāgatī kurvāte tasmāttasyaiva sa(sā)

761:305: veśāt, āśrayaviśeṣalābhādāryasya janmāntare rūpārūpyapraveśendriyasaṃcāraparihāṇayo na santi||

761:313: punaśca tadutthitaḥ anāsravaṃ tathaiva sa tān pravāhānhrasitvā yāva[tkṣaṇa] dvaye tiṣṭhatītyeṣa prayogaḥ|
761:323: śraddhādhimuktastu pūrvābhyāṃ ca kāraṇābhyāṃ kleśabhīrūtayā ca|
761:335: abhidharmapradīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ||
761:349: tasya vajropamasya samādherbalādutthitaṃ tadbalotthamantyavimuktimārgākhyaṃ tena sahaikālambanaṃ bhavati na vā|
761:353: sa khalu trayāṇāmāsravāṇāṃ niravaśeṣaprahāṇāttisṛṇāṃ ca śikṣāṇāṃ pāragamanāt sabrahmakasyāpi lokasya pūjāmarhatītyarhannirucyate||
761:354: eṣāṃ punastrayāṇāṃ mārgāṇāṃ katamaḥ sāsravo katamo nirāsravaḥ ? taducyate-
761:367: iha khalu yaḥ phalaviśiṣṭamārgasthaḥ indriyāṇi saṃcarati saphalaṃ phala[vi]śiṣṭaṃ ca mṛdvindriyamārgaṃ tyaktvā tīkṣṇendriyamārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ phalamātrameva pratilabhate|
761:372: prahāyeha hi yastu pañcāhāryadharmā paripūrṇaśaikṣaḥ” iti|
761:375: śaikṣasya khalu tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ paripūrṇatā bhavati|
761:377: tadyathā dṛṣṭiprāptasya kāmasākṣiṇaḥ anyataravaikalyāttu na paripūrṇatā syātprāgeva sarvavaikalyāt|
761:381: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ||
761:397: ” tāsāṃ punarindriyato bhūmitaśca vyavasthānaṃ tadidaṃ pradarśyate-
761:400: mauleṣu khalu caturṣu dhyāneṣu yo mārgaḥ sā sukhāpratipat|
761:405: śamathavidarśanānyūnatvāt anāgamyadhyānāntarikayorārūpyatraye cānāsravo mārgaḥ tīkṣṇendriyasya pratipat,

761:419: sā punareṣā bodhiḥ kṣayānutpādajñānarūpāsatī pudgalabhedena tridhā bhidyate|

761:450: evaṃ vīryaṃ cittaṃ mīmāṃsāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā niṣpannaḥ samādhiḥ sa eṣa cchandavīryacittamīmāṃsāsamādhiścaturvidhaḥ|
761:451: prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ cchandavīryasmṛtibuddhiśraddhāprasrabdhicetanopekṣābhiḥ pratyekaṃ samanvāgataḥ sarvaguṇasamṛddhiniṣpādako bhavati chandavīryacittamīmāṃsāparigrahaḥ sāmarthyāt|
761:453: ārabdhepi ca vīrye yadi na tatpraguṇameva cittaṃ bhavati na kāryābhiniṣpattirbhavati|
761:456: tatpravaṇepi citte yadi sūkṣmān samādhyupakleśānnopalakṣya parivarjayati yadi samādhyanuguṇān,
761:458: prajñayā nopacinoti tasyānyāyārabdhavīrye trayamapyetanna prayojananiṣpattaye bhavati|

761:474: tatra tāvacchraddhāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ buddhadharmasaṅghān sambhāvayataścittaṃ prasādamupayāti sadbhūtaguṇayogādapetadoṣatvācca,

761:510: upekṣā nāma rāgadveṣapakṣapātavipakṣeṇa yathābhūtajñeyamavekṣamānasya yaccittasamatānyatarapakṣābhisaṃskāravipakṣo nirvāṇāśayā sopekṣā bodhyaṅgamityucyate|

761:532: mūrdhāvasthāyāmṛddhipādāḥ prabhāvyante teṣu samādhibalalābhāccittanigrahe sati parihāṇyabhāvānna kadācid guṇadhanadaridro bhavati|

761:610: dvitīye tu dhyāne saṃkalpavarjitāḥ sarve vidyante|

761:668: atha kasmātsamanvāgatopi śaikṣaḥ samyagjñānena samyagvimuktyā cāṣṭābhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgataḥ śaikṣaḥ prātipada ityuktaṃ daśabhirarhan kṣīṇāsrava iti ? taducyate-
761:672: satyāmapi hi tasyāṃ kleśabandhanabaddhaḥ śaikṣo ṇa(na)
761:682: [468] pūrvoktaiva hi yā bodhiḥ sā samyagjñānamucyate|
761:688: kaścit khalvāha-anāgataṃ khalu cittamutpādyamānaṃ vimucyate'dhvavimuktyā sarvameva tvanāgataṃ vimucyate|
761:691: yadapi tadrūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktaṃ karmopapattiphalaṃ tadapyarhattvaprāptivibandhakaraṃ tacca sarvaṃ vajropamena prahīyata ityāvaraṇavigamāt sarvamevānāgatamaśaikṣaṃ cittaṃ vimucyate||
761:692: dharmā eva tu paramārthataḥ śikṣante| yasmāt-
761:694: auṣṇyākhyasya dharmasyendhanādidahanavyāpāre satyagnerapi dharmiṇo vyāpāra ucyate|
761:695: agninā kāṣṭhaṃ dagdhamityagnidahanavyāpāre ca devadattena dagdhosmītyupacaryate|
761:696: tathā dharmāṇāṃ kleśaprahāṇaśikṣaṇe sati tatsambandhāpekṣayā bhikṣuraśaikṣa ityucyate|
761:700: atha yeyamasaṃskṛtā vimuktiḥ ye ca trayo dhātavaḥ prahāṇadhātvādayaḥ,

761:712: yeṇa(na) vastunā nirvidyate virajyate'pi tena vastunā ?
761:717: virajyate tu yaḥ saṃraktaḥ sa ca sarvairapi duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgakṣāntijñānairvirajyate yaiḥ kleśān prajahāti|
761:719: tatra virvidyata evaṃ kāmavītarāgo niyāmamavakrāman duḥkhasamudayadharmakṣāntibhyāṃ taddharmajñānābhyāṃ ca pūrvaprahīṇatvānna kṣāntibhyāṃ jahātyapratipakṣatvānna jñānābhyāmato na virajyate|
761:720: bhāvanāmārgepi prayogavimuktiviśeṣā[t] mārgasaṃgṛhītābhyāṃ duḥkhasamudayajñānābhyāṃ na virajyate vimuktatvānnirviddhavastvālambanatvāttu nirvidyate|
761:721: dvitīyo(yā) koṭiḥ-virajyate evāvītarāgaḥ kāmebhyo niyāmamavakrāmannirodhamārgadharmānvayakṣāntibhiḥ bhāvanāmārge ca nirodhamārgajñānaistraidhātukādvairāgyaṃ gacchanna nirvidyate|
761:724: nobhayam-kāmavītarāgo niyāmamavakrāmannirodhamārgadharmajñānakṣāntibhyāṃ taddharmajñānābhyāṃ ca bhāvanāmārge cānantaryamārgetarābhyāṃ nirodhamārgadharmajñānābhyām||
761:725: ya ete trayo dhātavastā eva tisraḥ saṃjñāḥ prahāṇavirāganirodhasaṃjñāḥ|
